notes:
### v1.8.0
#### NEW FEATURES
![rDPS](https://i.imgur.com/4ZSQ3yE.png)
- added rDPS and related statistics
  - does **not** work in equalized/normalized content (e.g. hell mode)
  - elixirs are currently **not** supported
  - dark grenades and dagger bracelet are currently **not** supported
  - special thanks to [@Herysia](https://github.com/Herysia), [@Mathi](https://github.com/Mathicha), and [@faust](https://github.com/0fau)
- engravings are tracked now if rdps data is loaded
- added low performance setting (requires app restart after turning on) (settings > general)
- added option to keep local player color constant regardless of class (settings > accessibility)
- show skill gems on hover

![gems](https://i.imgur.com/cYoRDrT.png)

![rDPS2](https://i.imgur.com/cxKz9pP.png)

**RDPS Column Descriptions**
- rDMG: Raid Contributing Damage. Damage dealt without any external synergies (i.e. your base damage), plus the damage that your synergies gave to others.
- rDPS: rDMG per second.
- rD%: rDMG percentage of total raid damage.
- Recv: Damage gained from others' synergies.
- Given: Damage given to others from your synergies.
- Syn%: % of Damage gained from others' synergies.
- sSyn%: % of Damage gained from support synergies.
- dSyn%: % of Damage gained from dealer synergies.

#### BUG FIXES AND IMPROVEMENTS
- fixed meter crashing when there are no valid classes in a bugged encounter


full patch notes on [github](https://github.com/snoww/loa-logs/releases/latest)

send bug reports/suggestions to [#loa-logs](https://discord.gg/sbSa3pkDF5)
